snippet: Since Athletic Director Jim Fiore was hired in 2003, the university’s programs have won 22 conference championships.
abstract: Stony Brook's baseball team will become the second No. 4 seed to appear in the College World Series; that the team could advance so far so fast is a testament to its head coach Matt Senk, who began working at the university as a part-time physical education teacher 22 years ago; since athletic director Jim Fiore was hired in 2003, the university's programs have won 22 conference championships.
lead_paragraph: Since Athletic Director Jim Fiore was hired in 2003, the university’s programs have won 22 conference championships.

headline.seo: For Stony Brook, College World Series Appearance Is Latest in a String of Successes
headline.main: At Stony Brook, Baseball Is Just the Latest Success Story
headline.print_headline: At Stony Brook, Baseball Is Just the Latest Success Story
